title: MediaSubscription
description: A subscription which allows a user to access media including audio, video, books, etc.

allOf.description: A utility class that serves as the umbrella for a number of 'intangible' things such as quantities, structured values, etc.

authenticator.description: The Organization responsible for authenticating the user's subscription. For example, many media apps require a cable/satellite provider to authenticate your subscription before playing media.

expectsAcceptanceOf.description: An Offer which must be accepted before the user can perform the Action. For example, the user may need to buy a movie before being able to watch it.
